= !CommonFilesRedirect class function =

*Project:* [SystemInformationUnit System Information Unit].

*Unit:* _PJSysInfo_.

*Class:* _[TPJSystemFolders TPJSystemFolders]_

{{{
class function CommonFilesRedirect: string;
}}}

== Description ==

Returns the fully qualified path name of the Common Files folder, taking into account any redirection for 32 bit programs running on 64 bit Windows.

The return value will be the same as one of the _[TPJSystemFoldersCommonFiles CommonFiles]_ or _[TPJSystemFoldersCommonFilesX86 CommonFilesX86]_ methods as follows:

|| Operating System || Application || Return Value ||
|| 32 bit Windows || 32 bit || _[TPJSystemFoldersCommonFiles CommonFiles]_ ||
|| 64 bit Windows || 32 bit || _[TPJSystemFoldersCommonFilesX86 CommonFilesX86]_ ||
|| 64 bit Windows || 64 bit || _[TPJSystemFoldersCommonFiles CommonFiles]_ ||

*See also*

  * _[TPJSystemFoldersCommonFiles CommonFiles]_
  * _[TPJSystemFoldersCommonFilesX86 CommonFilesX86]_
